title: Coronavirus: a historical perspective
itunes:title: Coronavirus: a historical perspective
itunes:subtitle: As COVID-19 dominates the news, Laura Spinney asks what we might learn from pandemics in the past. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
As COVID-19 dominates the news, Laura Spinney draws historical parallels with other pandemics in history and asks what we might learn from disease outbreaks in the past. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
